pages.text: $(l)Meaning:$() Wisdom and Patience $(br)$(l)Primary Aspect:$() $(2)Wit$()$(br)$(l)Obtaining:$() Produce imbued lapis in the $(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:altars/imbuing_table)Imbuing Table$() or enhance $(#b0b)lapis lazuli$() in the $(#490)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:altars/crystal_altar)Crystal Altar$().
